main:
^You know it's not very polite to drop in unannounced, right?

^Of course I know who you are. Everybody's buzzing about the reporter that's digging around in the Mayor's dirt.

^Well, I can't tell you very much. It wouldn't be right to gossip.


^Oh what the heck.

^There's definitely something fishy about that Mayor.

^And about the cave outside town. I'm sure he has something to do with that!

^I don't know what it is, but something about the Mayor gets my gills going!

^If anybody asks, you've never met me.


^Maybe knock next time.

end
